name: Word Worm
description:
Help the Word Worm reach the finish line by making English words from the letters stacked in his way.

Click the letters to make words (3 letters or more). Once a word is accepted, the letters will disappear and create more space for the worm to crawl into. The screen is slowly scrolling but longer words rewind the screen a bit to give you more time.

There is presently a dictionary of 84,000 English words.

Complete the levels by reaching the finish line or getting the worm off the bottom of the screen. If the worm goes off the top of the screen, it’s game over.

Further instructions and controls are included in the game.

Made for the Weekly Game Jam #81 under the theme “words”.
